com.bizosys.hsearch.index
Class DocTeaser

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.index.DocTeaser
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStorable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DocTeaserWeight
public class DocTeaser
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStorable

Documents could be coming as structured or unstructured in a unified platform. So showing multiple document format results requires a standard way of accessing the result display section. Teaser fields standardizes this.

Author:
bizosys
